string.name: name
string.value: Badge of a Squad Member
Moira says she has a personal request...

Moira tells me that she was once a member of the Dragon Squad, and that she is worried about other members, now scattered to the winds. She asked me to look for the badge of the members. She said if I bring three badges from the members and the certificates from Zakum, Papulatus and Pianus by defeating them in battle, she would appoint me as an #rHonorary Squad Member#k and show me the #bsecret passage to cave#k that only members know about....

#i4001080##t4001080# #b#c4001080#/1#k
#i4001081##t4001081# #b#c4001081#/1#k
#i4001082##t4001082# #b#c4001082#/1#k
#i4001085##t4001085# #b#c4001085#/1#k
#i4001083##t4001083# #b#c4001083#/1#k
#i4001084##t4001084# #b#c4001084#/1#k
I gave three member badges and also Zakum, Papulatus and Pianus certificates to Moira. She then appointed me an Honorary squad member and showed me the secret passage to the cave.
사실은... 당신에게 개인적으로 부탁하고 싶은 일이 있습니다.
사실 저는 #b드래곤 결사대#k의 대원입니다. 드래곤 결사대는 나인스피릿을 도와 혼테일과 싸우던 이들이 결성한 조직으로 용족뿐 아니라 그들을 돕던 인간들로 만들어진 조직이었습니다. 하지만 나인스피릿이 혼테일에게 봉인된 후로 혼테일의 공격을 받은 우리는 뿔뿔이 흩어지게 되었습니다.
저는 이 곳에 갇혀서 동굴속으로 끌려 들어가는 동료들을 여러 번 보았습니다. 그들의 생사가 걱정이 돼요. 당신이 동굴 안에서 그들이 가지고 다니던 결사대의 표식을 찾게 된다면 저에게 꼭 가져와 주셨으면 합니다.
제가 이곳에 갇힌 이후로 3명의 동료가 동굴 안으로 끌려들어갔답니다. 그들의 표식을 찾아와 주세요. 그리고 동료들의 표식과 함께 당신의 용기를 증명할 자쿰의 표식, 파풀라투스의 표식, 피아누스의 표식를 하나씩 가져온다면 당신을 명예 결사대원으로 임명해 주겠어요.
명예 결사대원이 되면 결사대원들만이 알고 있는 동굴 속 비밀 통로를 알려드리겠습니다. 그러니 꼭 동료들의 표식을 찾아서 돌아와 주세요.
거절하시는건가요?
Actually, I have to ask you something.

I am a member of #bDragon Squad#k. Dragon Squad was set up to help Nine Spirit to fight Horntail. It's made up of not only dragons but also humans. Since Nine Spirit was sealed, we have scattered around.
Three of our members were drawn into the cave. Please get the badges they had.

Since I was locked here, three of our members have been drawn into the cave. Please get their badges. If you get certificates from Zakum, Papulatus, Pianus as well as badges of our members, I'll appoint you an honorary member of the Dragon Squad.
When you become a honorary member of squad, I'll let you know the secret passage in the cave. Please come back with badge of members.
Are you rejecting it?
Finally, you came back. Their certificates..Thank you. This comforts me a lot. You even brought the certificates of Zakum, Papulatus, and Pianus.
You deserve to be an honorary member of the squad. I'll give you a badge of an honorary member of the squad.
When you move the stone board with the badge, you'll see the secret passage. Your party can go through the passage. You can get to the cave much faster.
Now fight for the just as an honorary member of squad.
I still hear them screaming. If you get certificates of Zakum, Papulatus, Pianus as well as the badge of our members, I'll appoint you a honorary member of our squad.
